alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT QUEENS...RICHMOND...KINGS AND SOUTHERN NASSAU COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oakwood to 16 miles south of Long Beach. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Flatbush, Freeport, Valley Stream, Long Beach, Lindenhurst, Coney Island, Massapequa, Lynbrook, Woodmere, Rockaway Beach, Babylon, Jones Beach, Kennedy Airport, The Verrazano Narrows Bridge, and Canarsie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southwest Suffolk
